pageTitle: Aonidiella aurantii - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
textBeforeTable: Scientific classification California red scale From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia Aonidiella aurantii
textAfterTable: Binomial name Aonidiella aurantii Maskell California red scale is a major insect pest of citrus in California. See also: Aphytis melinus, who is a parasite of California red scale. [edit] References Pink, A. (2004). Gardening for the Million..
